name: SavannahSoundsforSleep
0:
”Alexa open savannah sounds”
”Alexa ask savannah sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: savannah sounds
des:
Let the sounds of the savannah lull you right to sleep. 

All you need to do is say Alexa start Savannah Sounds, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
